name: The Quest for the Grap juice
name_original: The Quest for the Grap juice
description:
The Quest for the Grap juice is a short game. (Better description below:)

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

When prompted, type.

Walk into things to interact with them.

Thats it! ;)

this is an education game about getting your friend josh some grap juice.

its a race against the clock, as you only get 45 seconds.

includes:

naming easter eggs!

custom music!

bonzi buddy voice on the you win screen!

_______________________

mild jumpscare warning
